label: [~te nuʔu | ʔe rerehu roː _i te riʔariʔa | ʔi raː hora he takea _i te poki _o te taŋata | ka topa mai | ʔi ruŋa _i te raŋi | ʔi ruŋa _i _a ia | te puːai ʔe te ʔanaʔana _o te ʔatua~]
